meanings.sent1: The sharp knife was penetrant, easily slicing through the soft bread.
meanings.sent2: The arrow was penetrant, flying swiftly through the air towards its target.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's penetrant vision allowed him to see through walls and catch the villains.
meanings.sent4: Her penetrant gaze seemed to look right into your soul, making you feel exposed.
meanings.sent5: The penetrant sunlight broke through the clouds, warming the chilly morning.

meanings.definition: A substance that is able to penetrate or seep into something
meanings.sent1: The oil acted as a penetrant, loosening the rusty bolts in no time.
meanings.sent2: The water acted as a penetrant, slowly seeping into the cracks of the old wall.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat accidentally knocked over the penetrant, causing a colorful spill on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The idea was a penetrant, spreading quickly through the minds of the students.
meanings.sent5: The penetrant scent of fresh flowers filled the room, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
